identity.name: Blake Gladson
identity.headline: Solutions Analyst
identity.summary: Passionate about building and leveraging systems to improve decision-making with data and analytics in the oil and gas industry.

how_i_work.philosophy_summary: Building effective solutions requires humility to ask questions and listen, a commitment to continuous learning and growth, and a focus on serving others through consistent communication and collaboration with end users.

principles.title: Be Humble
principles.description: Be willing to admit when you don't know something. Ask questions. Listen.

principles.title: Perpetually Grow
principles.description: Be comfortable being uncomfortable. Never stop learning.

principles.title: Serve Others
principles.description: Add value to those around you. The world is not zero-sum.

principles.title: DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself)
principles.description: Coding principles apply to other aspects of work. Automate repetitive work that introduces overhead so your focus stays on the work that adds the most value.
